home.hero_style: Split Layout: Left Text (H1 + Sub + CTA), Right 3D/Image. Background: Subtle grid pattern.
home.product_grid: Bento Grid 3x2. Each card must have a distinct hover color accent.
home.benefits: Zig-zag layout (Image Left/Text Right, then alternate).

products_summary.layout: Grid of 6 Cards with 'Learn More' buttons.

product_detail.layout: Sticky Sidebar Navigation (Features, Pricing, FAQ) on Desktop. Single column on Mobile.
product_detail.pricing: 3-Tier Card System. Middle card (Popular) popped out with Blue Border and Shadow.

dashboard_admin.style: Clean, white background, sparse borders, high data density.

do_not_use: Center alignment for long text blocks
Default browser scrollbars - use 'lenis' or custom CSS
must_do: Use data-testid on all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links)
Ensure contrast ratio > 4.5:1 for all text
Add hover states to ALL interactive elements
Use 'gap' for spacing, never 'margin' on children

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the provided image URLs strictly.
The admin panel must be functional (mocked backend is fine if needed, but UI must be real).
For the 'RestoFlow' page, use the 'restaurant_hero' image as the main visual.
For 'Contact', include the WhatsApp link: https://wa.me/593980136389
Create a 'Layout' component that wraps all public pages (Header/Footer).
